intro.title: Introduction to the Union
content: The Yemeni Students Union in Turkey - Elazig was established as an extension of the cooperation and brotherhood among members of the Yemeni community. It primarily aims to serve Yemeni students in Elazig city and support them in their academic journey.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading and trusted student union contributing to building a conscious, educated Yemeni generation capable of leading the future and contributing to the nation's renaissance.

vision.title: Our Mission
vision.description: To represent Yemeni students effectively, provide academic and social support, and create an environment stimulating success and creativity, while preserving our identity and values.

vision.title: Our Goals
vision.description: Promoting academic excellence, organizing cultural and social events, providing support for new students, and defending students' rights and interests.

vision.title: Our Values
vision.description: Cooperation, transparency, responsibility, and commitment to serving students with a spirit of brotherhood and belonging to the homeland.

values.title: Cooperation
values.description: We believe that teamwork is the key to success, and that together we can achieve more.

values.title: Integrity
values.description: We adhere to the highest standards of honesty and transparency in everything we do.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We always strive to provide the best and elevate the level of our services and activities.

values.title: Responsibility
values.description: We sense our responsibility towards students and society, and work hard to achieve our goals.
